item.description:
***RED SOX NATIVES AND BOSTON EVENT GUIDE ONCE AGAIN HAVE INVITED ALL DRINKING BUDDIES TO JOIN THEM FOR BOSTON'S BEST ROOF DECK HAPPY HOUR***

Join the Red Sox Natives and other groups for a Rush Hour at Splash Ultra Lounge from 5pm until 10pm. This is one of Boston's newest hot spots with 2 hours of complimentary food buffet from 5pm until 7pm.

Admission is FREE for those who RSVP at this link
Splash Happy Hour Registration

Splash is an amazing venue that offers plush lounges with billiards, has one of Boston's best and largest roof deck with cool cabanas. You can nosh on delicious and generous complimentary hors d'oeuvres.

A perfect place to hang out and enjoy a few drinks on a warm night. You have the choice to hang out in our reserved cabana on the roof or in our comfortable reserved indoor section.

Cocktails start at $12 wine at $10 and beer at $5.
Check out the Splash Drink Menu

You will find very attentive, pleasant and helpful staff.

Drink up, Eat up, and Enjoy yourself at one of Boston's coolest spots.

You must follow the registration instructions so you're added to the guest list.

Invite friends, co-workers and family....just remember to mention the registration policy to them.

Splash Dress Code is dress to impress, no sneakers, no t-shirts, no shorts for guys, no hats.

When checking in, ask the hostess for the Red Sox Natives Meetup reserved section.

All guests must be at least 21 with proper identification.

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Chinatown (orange line) and South Station (red line & commuter rail) subway stations are less than a ten (10) minute walk away.

There is very limited metered street parking available in the area.

Valet parking is $20.00.

YOU MUST MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER

www.bostoneventguide.com

www.splash-boston.com

www.redsoxnatives.com
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess for the Red Sox Native Meetup reserved seats
item.name: Rush Hour at Splash First Thursday hosts Boston Event Guide and Red Sox Natives
